string.text:
Developed together with the American legend, Marine Lieutenant Colonel Jeff Cooper, the Scout is a combination of future oriented design and innovative technical solutions. Versatile, lightweight and accurate up to 800m, it is the epitome of fine craftsmanship in a rifle. This model is chambered in 5.56x45mm.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Austria
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Steyr Mannlicher

Developed together with the American legend Marine Lieutenant Colonel Jeff Cooper, the Scout is a combination of future oriented design and innovative technical solutions. Versatile, lightweight and accurate up to 800m, it is the epitome of fine craftsmanship in a rifle. This model is chambered in 7.62x51mm.

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Austria
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Steyr Mannlicher
